integration_patterns: Message Queuing for healthcare data streaming

evidence.claim: LVM Systems utilizes AWS services for their infrastructure including S3 and Lambda.
The company mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations, indicating the use of secure data handling methods.
They provide an API that supports FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
LVM Systems has documentation on X12 transaction sets indicating their involvement with EDI for healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: LVM Systems demonstrates use of X12 transactions and HIPAA compliance for healthcare integrations.
